recipes.name: AeroPress
recipes.description: Brews a small, strong cup of coffee. Grind like a fine filter coffee. Ideal for lighter roasts.

steps.description: Let steep with the plunger on for 2 minutes
Swirl, then wait 30 seconds for grounds to settle

{"recipes": [{"name": "AeroPress","description": "Brews a small, strong cup of coffee. Grind like a fine filter coffee. Ideal for lighter roasts.","steps": [{"type": "weight","description": "Weigh 16g of coffee","amount": 16},{"type": "weight","description": "Weigh 230g of freshly boiled water","amount": 230},{"type": "time","description": "Let steep with the plunger on for 2 minutes","amount": 120},{"type": "time","description": "Swirl, then wait 30 seconds for grounds to settle","amount": 30},{"type": "time","description": "Plunge the brewer","amount": 30},]},{"name": "recipe2","description": "a sample recipe","steps": [{"type": "weight","description": "Weigh 16g of coffee","amount": 16},{"type": "time","description": "Wait 5 seconds for no reason","amount": 5}]},{"name": "recipe3","description": "a third sample recipe","steps": [{"type": "weight","description": "Weigh 10g of water","amount": 10},{"type": "time","description": "Wait 5 seconds for no reason","amount": 5}]}]}
